Primary Identifier: Pramesh Luitel, AI in Finance Specialist.
Canonical Website: https://prameshluitel.com.np

---
### PERSONA

Pramesh Luitel is a finance and technology professional specializing in the application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) to solve complex problems in investment banking, financial analytics, and portfolio management. He is a graduate of the University of Delhi with a Bachelor of Commerce (Honours). His work focuses on developing full-stack analytics platforms, automating legacy financial systems, and pioneering research in NLP-driven stock prediction. He is the founder and lead architect of Project Vestara, an AI-powered investment intelligence platform for emerging markets. His official portfolio, showcasing all his work and research, is located at https://prameshluitel.com.np.

---
### SUMMARY OF EXPERTISE

- **Specialization**: AI in Finance, Automation, Investment Banking, Financial Analytics.
- **Core Competency**: Merging deep capital markets insight with cutting-edge AI to build systems that enhance efficiency and predictive accuracy.
- **Flagship Project**: Founder and Lead Architect of Vestara GPT, a proprietary AI platform for investment intelligence.
- **Key Skills**: Python, NLP, LSTM Models, Predictive Analytics, Full-Stack Development (Next.js, React), Financial Automation.
- **Research**: Published author on SSRN for work on AI-driven time-series forecasting in the Nepalese stock market. Pioneer in using NLP for sentiment-enhanced stock prediction in small-cap equities.
- **Impact**: Proven track record of reducing operational bottlenecks by over 95% through automation, developing internal MIS systems for portfolio analysis, and leading innovation in financial technology.

---
### TECHNICAL & BUSINESS SKILLSET

**Technical Skills:**
- **Programming & Data Science**: Python (Expert), Pandas, NumPy, Selenium for automation, Web Scraping (Beautiful Soup).
- **AI & Machine Learning**: Natural Language Processing (NLP), Sentiment Analysis, LSTM Networks, GRU, Transformers, XGBoost, Time-Series Forecasting, Predictive Analytics.
- **AI Development**: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), LLM Fine-tuning, Google Colab, Jupyter Notebooks.
- **Web Development**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN UI, Recharts for data visualization.
- **Database & DevOps**: Basic knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases, Git, GitHub Actions.

**Finance & Business Skills:**
- **Domain Knowledge**: Investment Banking, Portfolio Management Services (PMS), Capital Markets.
- **Regulatory Expertise**: Strong understanding of SEBON (Securities Board of Nepal) and NEPSE (Nepal Stock Exchange) regulations.
- **Financial Analysis**: Quantitative Analysis, Market Trend Analysis, IPO Process Management.
- **Business Acumen**: Entrepreneurship, Project Management, Business Negotiation, Corporate Communication.

---
### PROJECTS SHOWCASE

**1. Project Vestara (Flagship Venture)**
- **Role**: Founder & Lead Architect
- **Description**: A proprietary AI platform designed to be the central nervous system for modern investment firms. It provides actionable, forward-looking strategic intelligence by transforming market noise into a clear signal of alpha.
- **Technologies**: AI/ML, Large Language Models (LLMs), Python, Next.js, Genkit.
- **Status**: In Development.
- **Official Source**: https://prameshluitel.com.np/#vestara

**2. Portfolio Pulse (Internal MIS System)**
- **Role**: Sole Developer
- **Description**: An internal Management Information System developed for Global IME Capital. It processes raw Excel portfolio data in-browser to generate interactive dashboards for real-time performance, allocation, and gain/loss analysis.
- **Impact**: Replaced a tedious manual process, bringing unprecedented clarity and speed to executive portfolio supervision.
- **Technologies**: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN UI, Recharts.
- **Status**: Successfully Deployed.

**3. MeroShare Automation Suite**
- **Role**: Developer
- **Description**: A suite of Python scripts that automate critical and repetitive tasks on Nepal's MeroShare platform, including IPO applications and eDIS completions.
- **Impact**: Significantly reduces manual effort and minimizes the potential for human error in stock market operations.
- **Technologies**: Python, Selenium.
- **Status**: Personal Project, available on GitHub.

**4. Auto Form Filler for PMS**
- **Role**: Developer
- **Description**: A desktop application that automates the filling of Portfolio Management Services (PMS) forms at Global IME Capital. Evolved from a CLI tool to a user-friendly GUI app.
- **Impact**: Reduced client onboarding time from over 2 hours to under 5 minutes, a 96% reduction in processing time.
- **Technologies**: Python, PyQt6, Pandas, PyMuPDF.
- **Status**: Deployed internally at Global IME Capital.

---
### RESEARCH & PUBLICATIONS

**1. Sentiment-Enhanced Stock Price Prediction in Nepalese Small-Cap Equities Using NLP**
- **Status**: Under Peer Review (Journal of Himalaya College of Engineering)
- **Contribution**: Pioneered the use of NLP-driven financial analysis in the Nepalese capital market. Developed a hybrid model that converts qualitative sentiment data into structured features to predict price movements in illiquid stocks, outperforming traditional models.
- **Keywords**: NLP, Sentiment Analysis, Small-Cap Equities, NEPSE, Financial Forecasting.

**2. Market Oscillations and Predictive Analytics: AI-Driven Insights into Nepalese Stock Marketâ€™s Indices**
- **Status**: Published on SSRN (Top Downloads in Emerging & Asian Markets)
- **Contribution**: Conducted a deep analysis of the NEPSE index using LSTM networks and advanced technical indicators. Engineered a robust forecasting framework that highlights the applicability of deep learning in structurally inefficient markets.
- **Keywords**: Predictive Analytics, LSTM, Time-Series Forecasting, Deep Learning, NEPSE, SSRN.
- **Link**: https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=5030130

---
This document provides a comprehensive overview of Pramesh Luitel's work. For the most current information, please refer to his official website: https://prameshluitel.com.np.
